name: Grave Harvest
description:
✞ ⸻ Grave Harvest ⸻ ✞

Have you ever dreamt of becoming a pumpkin farmer? No? Doesn't matter, because now you can become one! You're only two clicks away from fulfilling this dream! Don't wait, just jump in the mysterious far... graveyard and start growing the biggest pumpkin of all time! The most elite contest for the greatest pumpkin in the universe won't win itself, will it? 

Make the biggest pumpkin but feeding it with fertilizer from task (repairing cross, lighting a candle, planting flowers, cutting grass). But be aware of ghost and the time passing

Controls

Keyboard:

Move - WSAD
Attack ghost/cut grass - X/Space
Tasks/feeding pumpkin - LMB
Pause - Esc
Tasks/feeding pumpkin - LMB

Joystick:

Move - Left Stick
Attack ghost/cut grass - Right Trigger
Tasks/feeding pumpkin - A
Pause - Start
Change Selection in Menu - X
